title: 33 Things Every Girl Should Know About Women's History: From Suffragettes to Skirt Lengths to the E.R.A
description: Here’s the perfect book for anyone interested in learning more about girls and women in the United States from the 18th century to the present. Featuring contributions from a wide variety of women, including well-known nonfiction writers, a children’s librarian, historians, and many more, this latest addition to the 33 Things series provides an engaging, inspiring, informative look at the role women have played in shaping American history.
author: Tonya Bolden
